Question
========

We assume for this question that birth weight (in kg.) is normally is normally distributed with expectation 3.3 and variance 0.58. A birth weight of 3800 grams has a Z-score of

Answerlist
----------

* -1.486
* -0.527
* 0.619
* 0.657

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-1.486: Incorrect
-0.527: Incorrect
* 0.619: Incorrect
* 0.657: Correct
